name: GOLCE - an early 2k20 post-club Xperience
description:
GOLCE - AN EARLY 2K20 POST-CLUB XPERIENCE

* a work based on the feeling of nostalgia, where each of you will be able to travel through the forgotten world *

this atmospheric walking sim was designed as an immersive context for a friend's ambient/experimental music album -- it is best experienced with speakers or headphones

the whole experience is roughly 30-45 min long and there is no option to exit the app in between acts, so grab a drink, sit comfortably and enjoy the atmosphere

i have no experience in making games so it's a lil messy and it's untested, but it's made with love

*****

CONTROLS:

>W/A/S/D or arrow keys: move

>mouse or trackpad: look around
